meanings.definition: A style of Caribbean music originating in Trinidad and Tobago.
meanings.sent1: The soca music played at the party had a lively beat.
meanings.sent2: People love to dance to soca music during Carnival.
meanings.sent3: The soca music was so catchy that even the shyest person couldn't resist dancing.
meanings.sent4: The soca music filled the air like a burst of sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant soca rhythms echoed through the streets, bringing joy to all who heard.

meanings.definition: A type of dance associated with the music genre of soca.
meanings.sent1: She learned the soca dance steps quickly and joined the group.
meanings.sent2: The soca dance competition showcased some amazing talent.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at the soca dance made everyone laugh, but he had fun trying.
meanings.sent4: Her movements on the dance floor were as fluid and energetic as a soca dancer.
meanings.sent5: The soca dance performance was a burst of color and energy, captivating the audience.
